entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 1 in a few localities. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8 except minus 1 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of light snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
